title: North Korea’s AI-Powered Hackers Are Redefining Crypto Crime
contentSnippet: Mysten Labs’ chief cryptographer warns that artificial intelligence, not quantum computing, poses the real near-term threat to blockchain security.

title: Bitcoin Consolidates Above $111,000 as Breakout Awaits Fresh Catalyst
contentSnippet: Bitcoin stayed range-bound into 08:00 UTC on OCt. 25 as volume spiked on a defense of support and sellers capped rallies near the top of the recent corridor.

title: Crypto.com Applies for OCC National Trust Bank Charter to Expand U.S. Institutional Custody
contentSnippet: Crypto.com applied to U.S. banking regulator OCC for a national trust bank charter, a step it says would expand federally supervised crypto custody for institutions.

title: XRP Leads Gains on Ripple Moves, Bitcoin Holds $111K as ‘Uptober’ Dud Heads for Last Week
contentSnippet: October has been defined by forced selling and false starts and on track to become the worst since 2015, dampening an otherwise bullish month that averages over 25% returns for bitcoin.

title: Inverse Head-and-Shoulders Breakout Puts XRP on Track for $2.80 Test
contentSnippet: Failure to hold $2.50 on a closing basis would neutralize the bullish structure, potentially inviting rotation back toward $2.40–$2.42 support.

title: Dogecoin Hits $0.20 as Breakout Volume Triples Average, Confirms Bullish Setup
contentSnippet: Analysts are watching if DOGE can maintain support above $0.19, with a potential breakout above $0.2003 attracting further buying interest.

title: Ripple Prime Is the Fintech Firm’s One-Stop Institutional Trading and Financing Desk
contentSnippet: Ripple Prime bundles trading, financing and clearing for institutions in one service, with risk controls, regulated custody and optional RLUSD collateral.

title: Elon Musk's SpaceX Moves $133 Million Worth of Bitcoin
contentSnippet: Elon Musk's space exploration firm, SpaceX, moved $133 million worth of Bitcoin on Friday after transferring funds earlier this week.

title: Trump Picks SEC Crypto Task Force’s Mike Selig to Run CFTC: Report
contentSnippet: Selig, chief counsel for the SEC’s pro-crypto task force, is the president’s latest choice to run the CFTC, according to a Bloomberg report.

title: Public Keys: DraftKings Gets Predictable, Canaan Turns Around and Zelle Likes Stables
contentSnippet: DraftKings buys Railbird, Canaan rebounds from near-delisting, and Zelle embraces stablecoins in this week's Public Keys.

title: Custodia, Vantage Expand Pilot Into Live Tokenized Deposit Network for US Banks
contentSnippet: The two banks have moved from pilot to production with a platform that lets U.S. lenders issue interoperable tokenized deposits compliant with the GENIUS Act.

title: Coinbase’s Base token could be worth as much as $34 billion, JPMorgan says
contentSnippet: JPMorgan see Coinbase’s Base network growth and upcoming token exploration as a shift toward deeper onchain monetization.

title: YouTube Rival Rumble Teams With Tether to Add Bitcoin Tipping for Creators
contentSnippet: Publicly traded video sharing and livestream platform Rumble is adding Bitcoin tipping for its creator base.

title: Gold vs Ethereum: Which Hits $5K First? Here’s What the Charts Say
contentSnippet: Ethereum needs a 30% pump while gold requires 20% to reach $5K. But predicting which crosses the finish line first isn't as easy as that. Here's why.

title: President Trump taps Michael Selig to lead CFTC amid push for crypto oversight: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: The White House tapped Michael Selig to lead the CFTC as lawmakers move to cement the agency's authority over digital assets.

title: Spooky Szn? Bitcoin Options Worth Record $31 Billion Set to Expire on Halloween
contentSnippet: Despite the October flash crash and deleveraging event, Bitcoin traders are in for a record options expiry event at the end of the month. Here's what to expect.

title: Payments Processor Zelle to Use Stablecoins for International Transactions
contentSnippet: The initiative reflects stablecoins' rising significance in the financial services world.

title: Blockchain.com Gains Malta MiCA License as Company Eyes European Expansion
contentSnippet: The crypto firm is the latest to seek a MiCA license in Malta, as EU regulators raise concerns about uneven supervision across member states.

title: SpaceX moves another $134 million in bitcoin to new wallets: Arkham
contentSnippet: SpaceX appears to be consolidating its BTC by moving the cryptocurrency from older, legacy wallet addresses to new, modern ones.

title: Ledger’s new native multisig rollout sparks criticism over ‘cash cow’ fee model
contentSnippet: Ledger’s new multisig rollout sparked backlash from developers over added fees and lack of support for older Nano S devices.

title: Tether Eyes Fresh Investments to Push USAT Stablecoin to 100M Americans at December Launch
contentSnippet: Tether plans to launch its U.S.-compliant stablecoin USAT in December, aiming for mass reach in the creator economy, CEO Paolo Ardoino said in a CoinDesk interview.

title: The Daily: JPMorgan’s BTC and ETH pledge, Polymarket’s token and airdrop plans, OG bitcoin miner’s 14-year dormancy ends, and more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: Polymarket Will Launch Token and Airdrop After U.S. Relaunch, CMO Says
contentSnippet: "There will be a token, there will be an airdrop," CMO said as the platform nears an official U.S. return via a regulated exchange.

title: Stellar’s XLM Consolidates After Breakout as Volume Surge Hints at Institutional Activity
contentSnippet: XLM advanced 2.5% over 24 hours, breaking above key resistance on a 350% volume spike before easing into consolidation near $0.321, maintaining its broader uptrend structure.

title: Crypto.com Files for National Bank Charter Following Circle, Stripe and Coinbase
contentSnippet: Crypto exchange Crypto.com is the latest firm to apply for a national bank trust charter, joining a list that includes Coinbase and Circle.

title: Zelle weighs stablecoin integration to expand its trillion-dollar payments network abroad
contentSnippet: Early Warning Services, which operates Zelle, has launched an initiative designed to explore international transfers using stablecoin technology.

title: Softer inflation gives bitcoin room to run, but downside risks lurk beneath: analysts
contentSnippet: Bitcoin rose above $110,000 after softer U.S. CPI at 3.0%, while analysts say easing hopes clear policy risk, though options exposure leaves rallies fragile.

title: ‘UK expansion was never an if, but a when’: Bitpanda sets sights on becoming Britain’s leading crypto platform
contentSnippet: The Vienna-based crypto broker aims to make the country one of its largest markets within two years amid growing regulatory clarity.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase, Ripple among crypto titans donating to Trump’s new White House ballroom
contentSnippet: Crypto heavyweights — including Ripple and Coinbase — are among a list of donors contributing to the new White House ballroom.

title: Polymarket CMO confirms POLY token and airdrop plans as prediction market boom gathers steam
contentSnippet: Polymarket's Matthew Modabber said the prediction market will issue a POLY token and an airdrop after its U.S. app rollout.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.

title: NFT markets rebound after $1.2B wipeout in Friday’s crypto crash
contentSnippet: Top Ethereum NFT collections like BAYC, Pudgy Penguins and CryptoPunks remain in the red despite a partial market recovery after Friday’s crypto market crash.

title: Sorare CEO still bullish on Ethereum despite ‘upgrading’ to Solana
contentSnippet: Fantasy sports crypto platform Sorare is migrating from Ethereum to Solana, with its CEO saying it is a better fit for Sorare due to its scalability and focus on consumer applications.

title: How to use Google’s Gemini to research coins before you invest
contentSnippet: Google’s Gemini AI can help organize research, compare tokenomics and cut through noise. Here’s a workflow to analyze coins before you invest responsibly.

title: How to use ChatGPT to find hidden gems in the crypto market
contentSnippet: Discover hidden crypto gems using ChatGPT: GPTs, sentiment insights and data-driven scanners for smarter research and trading.

title: Early crypto gems: How to discover them first
contentSnippet: Spot early crypto gems in 2025 with five key checks — builders, usage, liquidity, token design and security — to avoid exit liquidity traps.
